title: Bug 116829Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:1. Modify the font size of a label in the UI.
OB: The label height is not adjusted immediately after changing the font size.
EB: The label height should be automatically adjusted to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Open the UI.
2. Locate a label that has a fixed font size.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height is not changed to fit the new font size.
